articles.author: Melonee Hurt, Craig Shoup
articles.title: 'American Idol' alum, Christian singer Mandisa found dead in Nashville - Tennessean
articles.description: An investigation is underway after 'American Idol' alum and Christian singer Mandisa was found dead in her Nashville-area home. She was 47.
articles.content: A spokesman for the Franklin Police Department said officers were involved in an active death investigation Friday after Christian singer and "American Idol" alum Mandisa was found dead in her Nashvi… [+3604 chars]
